import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react" import { Link, useParams, Navigate, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Col, Row, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card, Figure, ListGroupItem } from "react-bootstrap" import {addToCart, removeItem} from '../../redux/actions/cartActions' import '../CartItem/cartItem.css' import CheckoutStep from "../CheckoutStep/checkoutStep" const CartItems = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const {id} = useParams() //const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const cart = useSelector( state => state.cart) const productDetail = useSelector(state => state.productDetail.productDetail) const dataProduct = productDetail const { cartItems} = cart const removeTromCartHandler = (id) => { dispatch(removeItem(id)) } const checkoutHandler = () => { navigate('/shipping') } return (

Panier

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (Le panier est vide) : ( {cartItems.map(item => {item.title}

{item.price.toFixed(2)}€

dispatch(addToCart(item.product,Number( e.target.value)))} > { [...Array(dataProduct?.stock).keys()].map((x) => ( )) } )} )}

Total article(s) {cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.quantity, 0)}

Montant total : {cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price, 0).toFixed(2)} €

 ) } export default CartItems
